bug.short_desc: Binding the whole model item to a property

long_desc.thetext:
Please extend api documentation in that case a controller.bindProperty("", "fileProperty", null, item, id); call binds the complete model item to that property.
API doc is actually not telling anything about:
bindProperty((String | null) sourcePath, String targetProperty, (Map | null) options, Widget targetWidget, Number index) Helper-Method for binding a given property from the model to the target widget. This method should only be called in the qx.data.controller.IControllerDelegate#bindItem function implemented by the #delegate property. Parameters: sourcePath The path to the property in the model. targetProperty The name of the property in the target widget. options The options to use for the binding. targetWidget The target widget. index The index of the current binding.
Thanks
Mustafa Sak
Which controller/widget do you speak of? :)
Every controller who has interface: qx.data.controller.IControllerDelegate

Added a sentence to the sourcePath parameter documentation (in all 4 classes / mixins):
"If you use an empty string, the whole model item will be bound."
